branchCategory.name: AKH
branchCategory.description: <p>Check valve series 90-AKH offers various configurations to provide design solutions based on operating conditions.&nbsp; 90-AKH&nbsp;is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The series is compact and lightweight with low cracking pressure.&nbsp; The AKH with one-touch fitting, straight type, is easily installed in pipelines, while the male connector type can be mounted directly onto equipment.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-AKH, Check Valve with One-touch Fitting, Straight
branchItem.description: <p>Check valve series 90-AKH offers various configurations to provide design solutions based on operating conditions.  90-AKH is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The series is compact and lightweight with low cracking pressure.  The AKH with one-touch fitting, straight type, is easily installed in pipelines, while the male connector type can be mounted directly onto equipment.</p>
